name: Jump. Now!
description:
"Tough. Fascinating. Impressive." - LEVEL Magazine

"Simple and fast paced gameplay. Outstanding!" - CHIP Online

Are you ready for a new adventure? Trust your instincts and reflexes to pass each levels. The only thing you need is to tap the screen and jump over obstacles. Beware! Completing the levels will require your skills and attention! While playing, collect coins and unlock new balls. Compete with friends for top scores!
